ModMetaData.name: Rimoleum (Continued)

ModMetaData.description:

[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/Rimoleum][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img]
[h1]Overview[/h1] V1.1
Rimoleum: synthetic flooring
[h1]Details[/h1]
Rimoleum is a synthetic fire retardant flooring material that is quick to lay and affords some cleanliness. Great for areas like kitchens, food storage or any room where a combination of sanitary conditions and aesthetic appeal is desirable but not as crucial as say medical sanitary needs.
Images for patterns available: [url=https://1drv.ms/b/s!Au3GsmKyQkDYisFgupMPS3u7OrR0pA?e=ff8Gi5]Patterns PDF[/url]
Rimoleum tiles are made using Chemfuel and Synthread combined in a bio-fuel reactor.
[h1]Mod Notes[/h1]
Can be added to existing save games. To remove, you'd have to remove all related in game items and terrain.
Spacer Tech: Research project in own research tab.
Rimoleum tiles are categorised in their own sub section under manufactured items.
[h1]Compatibility[/h1]
RimPlas - will use RimRayon instead of Synthread, can also make the tiles in the injection moulder.
(CC BY-NC-SA 4.0)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
